wikipedia_page.main: Robert Bainbridge (5 January 1897 – 1967) was an English footballer who made 35 appearances in the Football League playing for Lincoln City. He played as a goalkeeper. He also played 37 times for Lincoln in the Midland League, and played non-league football for Jarrow, Sittingbourne, Gateshead Town and Leadgate Park.

response: * Bob Bainbridge (fl. 1920s), English footballer for Lincoln City
